page.title: 12Showborough, Twyning
page.content:
Showborough Nurseries: 8 years ago a family from Holland, bought Showborough House with 25 acres of land. The land was planted with hardwood saplings which are now sold as mature trees to public parks and estates. They converted the stable block into living accommodation and sold Showborough House with 5 acres of land. This has now been converted to a residential home for the elderly. 14 residents plus two families who run the above now live there. 15 local people are employed.
Showborough Common: this has a fluctuating population of gypsies. They are genuine people and good neighbours.
